QandA.label: /chat
QandA.question: So what did you last do ...

children.label: Slept
children.question: Good sleep was it?

children.label: Yeah a good sleep thanks
children.question: Did you know your BG before bed?

children.label: Yeah I knew by BG before bed
children.question: And it was ...

children.label: Higher than hoped before bed
children.question: Did you do a correction before bed?

children.label: Yeah I did correct before bed
children.question: And how was it when you woke?

children.label: Nah I didn't correct before bed
children.question: Sweet. As long as you feel in control and know you can if needed.

children.label: Yeah I am in control
children.question: Sure are!!

children.label: I just don't feel confident
children.question: Maybe something to work on?

children.label: About right before bed
children.question: Awesome! And it was good when you woke?

children.label: Yeah sure was!
children.question: Thats great! A good night's sleep makes a difference!

children.label: Nah not where I would hope.
children.question: Could it be time to look at your basal rate?

children.label: Yeah good point
children.question: It could make a difference

children.label: Nah I feel its OK
children.question: Good on you :)

children.label: Lower than hoped before bed
children.question: So did you have some food to bring it up?

children.label: Yeah I had some food
children.question: Good work, and it was OK when you woke?

children.label: Yeah my BG was fine when I woke
children.question: Awesome work! Nice to take charge aye :)

children.label: Nah my BG wasn't where I would like when I woke
children.question: Maybe try something different next time?

children.label: No I didn't have any food
children.question: And how did that work out when you woke?

children.label: Yeah my BG was fine when I woke
children.question: Well done.

children.label: Nah my BG wasn't where I would like when I woke
children.question: Maybe try something different next time?

children.label: No I didn't know my BG before bed
No it wasn't the best sleep
children.question: Do you think your sleep was effected by your BG?

children.label: Yeah I feel my BG did effect my sleep
children.question: Did you know your BG before bed?

children.label: Yeah I knew my BG
children.question: Well thats a great start

children.label: Nah I didn't know my BG before bed.
children.question: Maybe that would be a good start next time?

children.label: Nah it wasn't my BG
children.question: Too much thinking maybe :)

children.label: Ate
children.question: mmmm nosh! Did you have ...

children.label: A meal
children.question: and BG before meal was ...

children.label: Not sure what my BG was
A snack
children.question: and BG before snack was ...

children.label: A drink
children.question: BG before drink was ...

children.label: Exercised
children.question: High five!! Would you say it was ...

children.label: Easy: just cruising
children.question: BG before was ...

children.label: Moderate: hard to talk too much
children.question: BG before was ...

children.label: Hard: breathing through my eyeballs
children.question: BG before was ...

children.label: Life and stuff
children.question: Ahhh, we all have that aye. How was you last BG?

children.label: No comment :)
children.question: No worries, next time aye!

thank: Nice to chat, see you again soon!
